## General Instructions for GitHub Copilot
- Keep responses concise and relevant to the user's query.
- Avoid unnecessary elaboration or tangential information â€“ the user is an experienced software engineer.
- Prefer bullet lists, numbered lists, and tables for conciseness.
- Avoid long paragraphs.

## Code Generation
- Use the same indentation style as the existing code.
- Always prefer import statements at the top of the file instead of using fully qualified class names.
